original_title: Human Immunoglobulin case - Dr. Saman Ratnayake provides in-camera statement
original_body_lines: Additional Secretary of Health Saman Ratnayake, who was arrested over the import of substandard human Immunoglobulin injections, is provding a confidential in-camera statement before the Maligakanda Magistrate's Court.
He was remanded till March 14 over the import of substandard human Immunoglobulin injections case.
